ygData.subject: Re: Ethereal Mist Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: Note that they re greaves (aka leggings) and not gloves.  And Ethereal Mist stuff is !DROP stuff from Plane of Fear.  :) Lohre Soulsaver Bristlebane ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Note that they're greaves (aka leggings) and not gloves. And Ethereal Mist
stuff is !DROP stuff from Plane of Fear. :)

Lohre Soulsaver
Bristlebane

----- Original Message -----
From: Anne Falbo-Ortiz <topaaz_ladyjay@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 10:52 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Ethereal Mist Greaves


> From: "Anne Falbo-Ortiz" <topaaz_ladyjay@...>
>
> well that would suck big time but can i ask where these gloves come
from
> plz?
>
>
> >From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Ethereal Mist Greaves
> >Date: Wed, 22 Sep 1999 15:44:06 GMT
> >
> >From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
> >
> >It is probably a bug. I would /petition or /bug about this if I were
> >you. Things like this have been known to happen before.
> >
> >
> >>From: "Sirensa Qi'Seraph" <Sirensa@...>
> >>
> >>Under race for Ethereal Mist Greaves it says HUM ERU HIE HEF DWF - so
dark
> >>elf cleric is not able to wear this cleric only item????? Can anyone
> >>confirm this? I am a dark elf cleric and NOT very happy about this if
it
> >>is true..
> >>
> >>Sirensa
> >

> Topaaz / LadyJay - *Power Corrupts and absolute Power corrupts absolutly*
